title: Denmark says U.S. must 'show respect' after Trump appoints Greenland envoy
shortDescription: President Trump named Louisiana Gov. Jeff Landry as the U.S. Special Envoy to Greenland. Denmark isn't happy about it.

title: Trump names Louisiana governor as special envoy to Greenland
shortDescription: "Jeff understands how essential Greenland is to our National Security," President Donald Trump wrote in a post on Truth Social.

title: Trump set to expand immigration enforcement in 2026 despite backlash
shortDescription: White House border czar Tom Homan said the number of arrests will increase sharply as ICE expands detention capacity with the new funding.

title: Did the Trump admin take down over a dozen Epstein files? What to know.
shortDescription: More than a dozen Epstein files vanished from the DOJ database on Dec. 20, raising further questions over the handling of the Epstein file release.

title: Trump has previewed $2k checks. Here's what Americans think.

title: Bill Clinton among VIPs in new Epstein file photographs

title: Newly released Epstein files include Bill Clinton

title: Elise Stefanik exits NY governor's race, will leave Congress
shortDescription: The 41-year-old was the youngest woman elected to the House and transformed from a moderate to MAGA brawler in her defense of Trump and his agenda.
